title: Selective optimisation of catalytic activity by tuning the structural composition in nanoparticulate CuFe2O4
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00968A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Judith Zander, Michael F. Fink, Mina Attia, Christina Roth, Roland Marschall
CuFe2O4 nanocrystals, specifically targeting different cation ratios and structural compositions, were prepared for multiple electrochemical reactions, including HER, OER, ORR and CO2RR.
